20 static const std::string OPENCV_WINDOW = "Sayabot Face Tracking";
21 static const int frame_centre = 210;
22 int face_X_position;
23 
24 static int limit = 0;
25 static float data = 0;
26 static int e = 0, e1 = 0;
27 static float kp = 0.00055, kd = 0.0001;
28 static float present_X = 0, prev_X = 0;
29 static int count_X = 0;
30 
31 int msleep(unsigned long milisec)
32 {
33  struct timespec req = {0};
34  time_t sec = (int)(milisec / 1000);
35  milisec = milisec - (sec * 1000);
36  req.tv_sec = sec;
37  req.tv_nsec = milisec * 1000000L;
38  while (nanosleep(&req, &req) == -1)
39  continue;
40  return 1;
41 }
42 
43 class FaceDetectionTracking
44 {
45 public:
46  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
47  image_transport::ImageTransport it_;
48  image_transport::Subscriber im_sub_;
49  image_transport::Publisher im_pub_;
50  ros::Publisher servo_pub = nh_.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("/pan_controller/command", 100); // Publisher for servo message
51  ros::Publisher output_pub = nh_.advertise<std_msgs::Bool>("/sayabot_hospitality_perception/face_detection/output",100); //Publishes face_detection output
52  cv::CascadeClassifier face_cascade_;
53 
54  cv::HOGDescriptor hog_;
55 
56  FaceDetectionTracking() : it_(nh_)
57  {
58  // Path to the haarcascade_frontalface_alt.xml
59  cv::String face_cascade_name =
60  ("/home/niranjan/ros_workspaces/sayabot_ws/src/saya_hospitality_perception/saya_hospitality_face_tracking/include/saya_hospitality_face_tracking/haarcascade_frontalface_alt.xml");
61 
62  // Load the hog descriptor
63  hog_.setSVMDetector(cv::HOGDescriptor::getDefaultPeopleDetector());
64 
65  // Load face detector HAAR cascades
66  if (!face_cascade_.load(face_cascade_name))
67  ROS_ERROR("--(!)Error loading face detector cascade \n");
68 
69  // Subscrive to input video feed and publish output video feed
70  im_sub_ = it_.subscribe("usb_cam/image_raw", 1, &FaceDetectionTracking::imageCallback, this);
71  im_pub_ = it_.advertise("/sayabot_hospitality_face_tracker/output_video", 1);
72 
73  cv::namedWindow(OPENCV_WINDOW);
74  }
75 
76  ~FaceDetectionTracking()
77  {
78  cv::destroyWindow(OPENCV_WINDOW);
79  }
80 
81  void imageCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
82  {
83  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr; // Make image processable in ROS
84 
85 
86  std_msgs::Float64 servo_msg; // Float64 message for dynamixel_servo/command topic
87 
88  std_msgs::Bool output_msg;
89 
90  try
91  {
92  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BGR8);
93  }
94  catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e)
95  {
96  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s", e.what());
97  return;
98  }
99  cv::Mat im_bgr = cv_ptr->image;
100 
101  std::vector<cv::Rect> detected_faces;
102  cv::Mat im_gray;
103  cv::cvtColor(im_bgr, im_gray, CV_BGR2GRAY); // converting RGB image to gray_scale
104  cv::equalizeHist(im_gray, im_gray);
105 
106  // HAAR Face detector
107 
108  face_cascade_.detectMultiScale(im_gray, detected_faces, 1.1, 3, 0 | CV_HAAR_SCALE_IMAGE, cv::Size(30, 30));
109 
110  if ((detected_faces.size()) == 0)
111  {
112  ROS_INFO_STREAM("No person detected");
113  limit++;
114  output_msg.data = 0;
115  output_pub.publish(output_msg);
116  ROS_INFO_STREAM(limit);
117  if (limit >= 2)
118  {
119  data = 2.5;
120  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Data");
121  ROS_INFO_STREAM(data);
122  servo_msg.data = data;
123  servo_pub.publish(servo_msg); // Message publishes to joint_controller/command
124  limit = 0;
125  }
126  }
127 
128  // Draw detected detected_faces to screen as circles
129  for (unsigned i = 0; i < detected_faces.size(); i++)
130  {
131  ROS_INFO_STREAM("height=");
132  ROS_INFO_STREAM(detected_faces[i].height);
133 
134  if (detected_faces[i].height > 125 && detected_faces[i].height < 300)
135  {
136  limit = 0;
137  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Person detected");
138  output_msg.data = 1;
139  output_pub.publish(output_msg);
140  cv::Point center(detected_faces[i].x + detected_faces[i].width * 0.5,
141  detected_faces[i].y + detected_faces[i].height * 0.5);
142 
143  // Drawing circle around faces
144  cv::ellipse(im_bgr, center, cv::Size(detected_faces[i].width * 0.5, detected_faces[i].height * 0.5), 0, 0, 360,
145  cv::Scalar(255, 0, 255), 4, 8, 0);
146 
147  ROS_INFO_STREAM("X=");
148  ROS_INFO_STREAM(detected_faces[i].x);
149 
150  face_X_position = detected_faces[i].x;
151  ROS_INFO_STREAM(face_X_position);
152  ROS_INFO_STREAM(frame_centre);
153 
154  // Logic for tracking the face
155  if (detected_faces[0].width > detected_faces[1].width)
156  {
157  present_X = detected_faces[0].x;
158  }
159  else
160  {
161  present_X = detected_faces[1].x;
162  }
163  if (prev_X <= present_X + 10 && prev_X >= present_X - 10)
164  {
165  count_X++;
166  }
167  else
168  {
169  count_X = 0;
170  }
171 
172  e = 210 - detected_faces[i].x;
173  if (e < 0)
174  {
175  e = -e;
176  }
177  /*
178  ROS_INFO_STREAM("E");
179  ROS_INFO_STREAM(e);
180  ROS_INFO_STREAM("prev_X");
181  ROS_INFO_STREAM(prev_X);
182  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Present_X");
183  ROS_INFO_STREAM(present_X);
184  */
185 
186  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Count");
187  ROS_INFO_STREAM(count_X);
188 
189  prev_X = present_X;
190 
191  if (count_X >= 1)
192  {
193  if (present_X < 200)
194  {
195  // data = data + kp*e + kd*(e - e1);
196  data = data + kp * e;
197  if (data <= 1|| data >= 4)
198  {
199  data = 4;
200  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Data");
201  ROS_INFO_STREAM(data);
202  servo_msg.data = data;
203  servo_pub.publish(servo_msg);
204  }
205  else
206  {
207  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Data");
208  ROS_INFO_STREAM(data);
209  servo_msg.data = data;
210  servo_pub.publish(servo_msg);
211  }
212  e1 = e;
213  }
214  else if (present_X > 220)
215  {
216  // data = data - kp*e + kd*(e - e1);
217  data = data - kp * e;
218  if (data <= 1 || data >= 4)
219  {
220  data = 1;
221  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Data");
222  ROS_INFO_STREAM(data);
223  servo_msg.data = data;
224  servo_pub.publish(servo_msg);
225  }
226  else
227  {
228  servo_msg.data = data;
229  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Data");
230  ROS_INFO_STREAM(data);
231  servo_pub.publish(servo_msg);
232  }
233  e1 = e;
234  }
235  }
236  }
237 
238  else
239  {
240  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Person detected:OUT OF RANGE");
241  limit++;
242  output_msg.data = 0;
243  output_pub.publish(output_msg);
244  ROS_INFO_STREAM(limit);
245  if (limit >= 2)
246  {
247  data = 2.5;
248  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Data");
249  ROS_INFO_STREAM(data);
250  servo_msg.data = data;
251 
252  servo_pub.publish(servo_msg);
253  limit = 0;
254  }
255  ROS_INFO_STREAM("DATA:");
256  ROS_INFO_STREAM(data);
257  }
258  }
259 
260  cv::imshow(OPENCV_WINDOW, im_bgr);
261  cv::waitKey(3);
262  }
263 };
264 
265 int main(int argc, char** argv)
266 {
267  ros::init(argc, argv, "hog_haar_person_detection1");
268  FaceDetectionTracking object;
269  ros::spin();
270  return 0;
271 }
